Package meka.experiment

Class DefaultExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.events.LogObject
      • meka.experiment.DefaultExperiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, LogSupporter, Experiment, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class DefaultExperiment
extends LogObject
implements Experiment
    Default experiment which executes experiments on the local machine.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
